trans-unit.source: Provides pop-up or online Help for controls.
Each instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> maintains a collection of references to controls associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 每個執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>維持一個與其相關聯的控制項的參考的集合。

trans-unit.source: To associate a Help file with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的說明檔案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You specify the type of Help provided by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> method and providing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator> value for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的呼叫所提供的說明類型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>方法並提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator>指定之控制項的值。

trans-unit.source: You provide the keyword or topic for the Help by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您提供的關鍵字或主題的說明藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm.
trans-unit.target: 若要開啟 [說明] 5d; 的特定主題，關鍵字應該傳遞格式*topicName*.htm。

trans-unit.source: To associate a specific Help string with a control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將特定的 [說明] 字串與控制項產生關聯，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The string that you associate with a control using this method is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下 F1 鍵，且焦點在控制項時，您會使用這個方法的控制項關聯的字串會顯示快顯視窗中。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property has not been set, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to provide the Help text.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>屬性尚未設定，您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>方法以提供說明文字。

trans-unit.source: If you have set both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> and the Help string, Help based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> will take precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果您同時設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>的說明字串，說明根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>更高的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> calls methods on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help> class to provide Help functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> 方法呼叫上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help>類別來提供說明功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>類別，以包含四個地址欄位在表單上顯示即時線上說明。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to set the Help ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>方法，以設定協助工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 即時線上說明 按鈕，然後按一下 地址欄位說明資料指標時，協助工具提示會顯示使用指定的文字。

trans-unit.source: When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property has been set to mspaint.chm.
trans-unit.target: 當您按 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位時，會顯示 mspaint.chm 說明檔，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>屬性已設定為 mspaint.chm。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A> method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>方法呼叫每個位址控制項，來識別它有可用的說明內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider" /> class.

Once you have created an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> method, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> method to associate your Help topics with a control.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您建立的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>類別，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>方法，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>方法，以將您的說明主題與控制項產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>類別，以包含四個地址欄位在表單上顯示即時線上說明。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to set the Help ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>方法，以設定協助工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 即時線上說明 按鈕，然後按一下 地址欄位說明資料指標時，協助工具提示會顯示使用指定的文字。

trans-unit.source: When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property has been set to `mspaint.chm`.
trans-unit.target: 當您按 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位時，會顯示 mspaint.chm 說明檔，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>屬性已設定為`mspaint.chm`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A> method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>方法呼叫每個位址控制項，來識別它有可用的說明內容。

trans-unit.source: The object that the externder properties are provided to.
Specifies whether this object can provide its extender properties to the specified object.
<see langword="true" /> if this object can provide its extender properties; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> from which to retrieve the Help topic.
Returns the Help keyword for the specified control.

The Help keyword associated with this control, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider" /> is currently configured to display the entire Help file or is configured to provide a Help string.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> from which to retrieve the Help navigator.
Returns the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator" /> setting for the specified control.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator" /> setting for the specified control.
The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator.AssociateIndex" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> from which to retrieve the Help string.
Returns the contents of the pop-up Help window for the specified control.
The Help string associated with this control.
The default is <see langword="null" />.
To display this Help string at run time, the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has the input focus.
trans-unit.target: 若要在執行階段顯示此說明的字串，使用者按下 F1 鍵，而指定的控制項有輸入的焦點。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventHandler> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventHandler> classes to filter input.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventHandler>類別來篩選輸入。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.GetHelpString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.GetHelpString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This is a complete example; it is ready to run once you add it to your project.
trans-unit.target: 這是完整的範例。它已準備好執行一次將它加入至您的專案。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> for which Help will be displayed.
Returns a value indicating whether the specified control's Help should be displayed.
<see langword="true" /> if Help will be displayed for the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to associate a keyword or prompt with a specified control, calling this method automatically returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>方法與指定的控制項，並傳回自動呼叫這個方法中的關鍵字或提示`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can override this behavior by passing `false` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由傳遞覆寫這個行為`false`至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the Help file associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider" /> object.
The name of the Help file.
trans-unit.target: 說明檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm 的表單。

trans-unit.source: The file name retrieved by this method identifies the file that provides Help support for all the controls for which this object provides Help.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所擷取的檔案名稱會識別為此物件會提供說明的所有控制項提供說明支援的檔案。

trans-unit.source: This file name can designate either a compiled Help (.chm) file or a raw HTML file.
trans-unit.target: 已編譯的說明 (.chm) 檔案或原始的 HTML 檔案，可以指定此檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>類別，以包含四個地址欄位在表單上顯示即時線上說明。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> to set the Help ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>設定協助工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: When using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 使用 [即時線上說明] 按鈕，並按一下說明資料指標上的 [位址] 欄位，協助工具提示出現時使用指定的文字。

trans-unit.source: When pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the `mspaint.chm` Help file is displayed because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property has been set to `mspaint.chm`.
trans-unit.target: 按 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位中，當`mspaint.chm`會顯示說明檔，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>屬性已設定為`mspaint.chm`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A> method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>方法呼叫每個位址控制項，來識別它有可用的說明內容。

trans-unit.source: The control to remove Help from.
Removes the Help associated with the specified control.
This method is used by the designer.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由設計工具。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that specifies the control for which to set the Help topic.
The Help keyword to associate with the control.
Specifies the keyword used to retrieve Help when the user invokes Help for the specified control.
The Help keyword provides the key information to retrieve the Help associated with this control from the Help file specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 說明關鍵字提供索引鍵的資訊來擷取所指定的說明檔案從這個控制項相關聯的說明<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm.
trans-unit.target: 若要開啟 [說明] 5d; 的特定主題，關鍵字應該傳遞格式*topicName*.htm。

trans-unit.source: To clear the keyword, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> method with a `keyword` value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除的關鍵字，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>方法`keyword`值`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> for which to set the Help keyword.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator" /> values.
Specifies the Help command to use when retrieving Help from the Help file for the specified control.
The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, place it in a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> named `HelpProvider1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> named `TextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將它放在表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>名為`HelpProvider1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>名為`TextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: The example requires the existence of a Help file named input.chm in the C:\Windows directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要名為 input.chm C:\Windows 目錄中的說明檔存在。

trans-unit.source: The value of <paramref name="navigator" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator" /> values.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> with which to associate the Help string.
The Help string associated with the control.
Specifies the Help string associated with the specified control.
The Help string that you specify in the `helpString` parameter is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 您在中指定的說明字串`helpString`時指定的控制項焦點時使用者按下 F1 鍵，將會顯示快顯視窗中的參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>類別，以包含四個地址欄位在表單上顯示即時線上說明。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to set the Help ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>方法，以設定協助工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 即時線上說明 按鈕，然後按一下 地址欄位說明資料指標時，協助工具提示會顯示使用指定的文字。

trans-unit.source: When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property has been set to `mspaint.chm`.
trans-unit.target: 當您按 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位時，會顯示 mspaint.chm 說明檔，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>屬性已設定為`mspaint.chm`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A> method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>方法呼叫每個位址控制項，來識別它有可用的說明內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> for which Help is turned on or off.
<see langword="true" /> if Help displays for the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Specifies whether Help is displayed for the specified control.

If you previously called the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> for the control specified in the `ctl` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> automatically displays Help for that control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您先前呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>控制項中指定`ctl`參數，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>自動顯示該控制項的說明。

trans-unit.source: To modify this behavior, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A> method, specifying `false` in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改這個行為，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>方法，指定`false`中`value`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>類別，以包含四個地址欄位在表單上顯示即時線上說明。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to set the Help ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>方法，以設定協助工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 即時線上說明 按鈕，然後按一下 地址欄位說明資料指標時，協助工具提示會顯示使用指定的文字。

trans-unit.source: When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property has been set to `mspaint.chm`.
trans-unit.target: 當您按 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位時，會顯示 mspaint.chm 說明檔，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>屬性已設定為`mspaint.chm`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A> method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>方法呼叫每個位址控制項，來識別它有可用的說明內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains supplemental data about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含有關 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider" /> 的資料。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider" />.
A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the type and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.ToString%2A>方法會傳回字串，包含的類型和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>。
